# Description

This script run simulation M times to compare methods, test set = h-step-ahead forecast error


```{r}
library(MASS)
# library(matrixcalc)
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

library(tsibble)
library(fabletools)
library(fable)
library(feasts)

library(devtools)
load_all()
```


# Parameters


```{r}
groups <- c(2,2)
T <- 50
h <- 5
Tsplit <- T - h
diag_range <- c(0.4, 0.8)
offdiag_range <- c(-0.8, 0.8)

A <- generate_block_diag(
  groups = groups,
  diag_range = diag_range,
  offdiag_range = offdiag_range
)$A

rho <- runif(length(groups), 0.6, 0.9)
Sigma <- generate_cor(
  groups = groups,
  rho = rho,
  delta = min(rho) * 0.5,
  # delta = 0.15,
  epsilon = (1-max(rho)) * 0.5,
  # epsilon = 0.15,
  eidim = length(groups)
)
# convert to cov using random sd
Sigma <- convert_cor2cov(Sigma)
# flip signs
V <- diag(x = sample(c(-1,1), size = sum(groups), replace = TRUE))
Sigma <- V %*% Sigma %*% V

Sigma %>% eigen(only.values = TRUE)
```

```{r}
structure <- list(
  groups,
  as.list(seq(1,length(groups))),
  list(c(1,2))
)
(S <- construct_S(
  structure = structure,
  sparse = FALSE,
  ascending = FALSE
))
order_S <- rownames(S)
```

```{r}
# generate bottom-up series
bottom <- simulate_bottom_var(groups, T, intercept = 100, A=A, Sig=Sigma)
plot(as.ts(bottom$Y))
```

```{r}
hts_mat <- bottom$Y %*% t(S)

hts <- hts_mat %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(time = seq(1, nrow(hts_mat))) %>% 
  # select(time, everything()) %>% 
  as_tsibble(index = time) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -time,
    names_to = "series",
    values_to = "value"
  )

fit <- hts %>% 
  filter(time <= Tsplit) %>%
  model(
    arima = ARIMA(value)
  )

fc <- fit |>
  forecast(h = h) |>
  as_fable(response = "value", distribution = value)
```

```{r}
# Get data
y <- hts_mat[1:Tsplit, order_S]
actual <- hts_mat[(Tsplit + 1):T, order_S]

y_hat <- fit %>% 
  augment() %>% 
  select(series, .fitted) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = series, values_from = .fitted, names_sort = FALSE) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  select(-time) %>% 
  as.matrix()

base_fc <- fc %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  select(series, .mean, time) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = series, values_from = .mean) %>%
  select(-time) %>% 
  as.matrix()

y_hat <- y_hat[, order_S]
base_fc <- base_fc[, order_S]
```

```{r}
# Get covariance estimates
W_shr <- shrinkage_est(
  y - y_hat
)
W_n <- novelist_cv(
  y,
  y_hat,
  S,
  window = round(Tsplit/2),
  message = FALSE
)

# Reconcile
recon_mint_shr <- reconcile_mint(base_fc, S, W_shr$cov)
recon_mint_n <- reconcile_mint(base_fc, S, W_n$cov)
recon_mint_sample <- reconcile_mint(
  base_fc, S, compute_cov_matrix(y-y_hat, zero_mean = T)
)
```

```{r}


# Organise reconciled results into the fc_new object
to_fbl <- function(recon_mint) {
  as_tibble(recon_mint) %>% 
  mutate(
    h = row_number()
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -h,
    names_to = "series",
    values_to = ".mean"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    .model = "mint_shrink",
    time   = h + Tsplit,
    value  = NA
  ) %>%
  select(series, .model, time, value, .mean) 
  # %>% 
  # as_tsibble(key=c(series, .model), index=time)
  # as_fable(response = "value", distribution = value, index = time, key = c(series, .model))
}

fc_shr <- to_fbl(recon_mint_shr)
fc_n <- to_fbl(recon_mint_n)
fc_sample <- to_fbl(recon_mint_sample)

fc_recon <- fc[0, ] # empty tibble to store results
fc_recon <- bind_rows(
    # fc_recon,
    fc_shr,
    fc_n,
    fc_sample
  )

fc_recon %>% select(-value) %>% as_tsibble(key=c(series, .model), index=time)
fc_recon %>% as_fable(response = "value", distribution = value, index = time, key = c(series, .model))

fc_full <- bind_rows(fc, fc_recon %>% as_tsibble(key=c(series, .model), index=time)) 
```
